title: Early signs that your relationship will last
text:

As the cliche goes, morning shows the day. When you have entered into a relationship, the early days can foretell whether it's going be a life-long affair or not. All you need to do is watch out for these tell-tale signs:You and your bae feel that you have known each other since ages as both of you feel equally comfortable with each other. You have already become to each other the best friend none of you ever had!That's going to be a strong glue that will hold you together. Right from the beginning, it's very clear that there's no clash in your life and career goals. What's more, both of you subscribe to similar political and social views.Both of you do your best to meet commitments towards each other. You keep your words and he makes sure that even your smallest requests are kept.You both are good, active listeners. You both lend each other patient hearing, curbing any tendency to out-talk each other.Both of you are ready to own up if you have made any mistake or if you have hurt each other. In fact, both of you never let you ego come in the way of your apology.
description: When you start a relationship, both of you tend to show the best versions of yourselves. Yet early signs do show that your love is built to last.
